item.title: More Code Please
item.description: I work on a computer that has many, many apps and frameworks and plug-ins that pump and bang and grind all night and day.

item.title: The End of an Indie
item.description: In this post, I talk about why I'm shutting down Mobile App Mastery and re-joining the 9-5.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: In this first post on the @MattjCamp blog, Matt talks about the purpose and scope of @MattjCamp.
